snippet: The co-creator David Lynch, who was to direct the series, announced that a dispute over the budget had caused him to opt out of Showtime’s revival of the show that began in 1990.
abstract: David Lynch, co-creator of television series Twin Peaks, announces that he will not direct any episodes of Showtime's revival due to disagreement over budget.
lead_paragraph: The co-creator David Lynch, who was to direct the series, announced that a dispute over the budget had caused him to opt out of Showtime’s revival of the show that began in 1990.

headline.main: ‘Twin Peaks’ Return in Doubt as Director Lynch Backs Out
headline.print_headline: ‘Twin Peaks’ Return in Doubt as Director Lynch Backs Out
